title: all: convert examples in comment to runnable examples
body:
by **codezero**: 
The examples here: http://golang.org/pkg/crypto/sha1/#example_New and
http://golang.org/pkg/crypto/md5/#example_New

Currently show:

h := New()

Should show:

h := sha1.New()
and
h := md5.New()

It also probably wouldn't kill to make these use the playground style examples that
other examples use.
